title: Can't Find Myself On Summoner Search
body: Now, if you look up the name ĐragonSlayer on the in-game summoner search, you will turn up no results. But this is my account, I can sign into it. But then I can't find it, okay rito. Also, nothing else can find it, does having a special character in my name make it impossible to find me or does riot just hate me in particular? {{sticker:sg-janna}}

replies.body:
Was this one not your review?

https://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/featured/year-in-review-2017#/summoner/na/ðragonslayer
I don't know why I didn't think of this sooner, but, apparently taking it from the Year In Review actually works, no idea why tho.
